# GCExtendedGamepadSnapShotDataV100

**Structure**

A structure that holds a snapshot of an extended gamepad controller’s input data.

## Declaration

```swift
struct GCExtendedGamepadSnapShotDataV100
```

## Instance Properties

- **buttonA**: The value of the A button.
- **buttonB**: The value of the B button.
- **buttonX**: The value of the X button.
- **buttonY**: The value of the Y button.
- **dpadX**: The value of the horizontal axis of the dpad.
- **dpadY**: The value of the vertical axis of the dpad.
- **leftShoulder**: The value of the left shoulder button.
- **leftThumbstickX**: The value of the horizontal axis of the left thumbstick.
- **leftThumbstickY**: The value of the vertical axis of the left thumbstick.
- **leftTrigger**: The value of the left trigger.
- **rightShoulder**: The value of the right shoulder button.
- **rightThumbstickX**: The value of the horizontal axis of the right thumbstick.
- **rightThumbstickY**: The value of the vertical axis of the right thumbstick.
- **rightTrigger**: The value of the right trigger.
- **size**: The size of the recorded structure, in bytes.
- **version**: A value that indicates the version number of the data structure.

## Initializers

- **init()**
- **init(version:size:dpadX:dpadY:buttonA:buttonB:buttonX:buttonY:leftShoulder:rightShoulder:leftThumbstickX:leftThumbstickY:rightThumbstickX:rightThumbstickY:leftTrigger:rightTrigger:)**

## Flattening a Snapshot to Memory

- **NSDataFromGCExtendedGamepadSnapShotDataV100(_:)**: Encapsulates the controller data from an extended gamepad structure into a data object.
- **GCExtendedGamepadSnapShotDataV100FromNSData(_:_:)**: Copies the recorded data from an extended gamepad snapshot into a readable structure.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Sendable
